name: Afraid of the Dark (Daniel Graves)
description:
Run and find your way through randomly generated levels, squishing shadow-like monsters and killing fierce bosses. Heavily inspired by The Binding of Isaac.

This is my first time experimenting with random generation, so hope it's not too buggy.

Benjamin Wang (ThePatientHusky): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl3QNya9p-BJlk3zQO2mAyA

Controls:

Attack by jumping on enemies/bosses

Arrow Keys/WASD - Movement

Up arrow - Enter door

Space/Z - Jump (Hold to jump higher)

ESC - Pause
